directions.step:
Slice off top of apple; remove core. Prick outside with sharp fork. Place apple in tall narrow bowl. Combine orange and lemon juice; pour over apple. (Add extra water if apple is not covered.) Marinate in refrigerator 4-5 hours. Combine raisins, celery, and applesauce. Allow to mellow at room temperature 2 hours. Chill thoroughly. Drain apple. Cut apple into 8 sections, slicing almost to the bottom. Fill with applesauce mixture. Place on crisp lettuce leaf. 1 serving = 2 fruit calories = 54 Pat Empson 05/21 07:13 am FOOD AND WINE BB TOPIC: FOOD SOFTWARE TIME: 05/21 7:34 AM
